00040 LaCropParameter::LaCropParameter(const LaCropParameter& theCropParameter)
00041 {
00042   mName=theCropParameter.name();
00043   mDescription=theCropParameter.description();
00044   setGuid(theCropParameter.guid());
00045   setCropGuid(theCropParameter.cropGuid());
00046   mPercentTameCrop=theCropParameter.percentTameCrop();
00047   mCropRotation = theCropParameter.cropRotation();
00048   mFallowRatio = theCropParameter.fallowRatio();
00049   mFallowValue = theCropParameter.fallowValue();
00050   mAreaUnits = theCropParameter.areaUnits();
00051   mUseCommonLand = theCropParameter.useCommonLand();
00052   mUseSpecificLand = theCropParameter.useSpecificLand();
00053   mRasterName = theCropParameter.rasterName();
00054 }

00056 LaCropParameter& LaCropParameter::operator=(const LaCropParameter& theCropParameter)
00057 {
00058   if (this == &theCropParameter) return *this;   // Gracefully handle self assignment
00059 
00060   mName=theCropParameter.name();
00061   mDescription=theCropParameter.description();
00062   setGuid(theCropParameter.guid());
00063   setCropGuid(theCropParameter.cropGuid());
00064   mPercentTameCrop=theCropParameter.percentTameCrop();
00065   mCropRotation = theCropParameter.cropRotation();
00066   mFallowRatio = theCropParameter.fallowRatio();
00067   mFallowValue = theCropParameter.fallowValue();
00068   mAreaUnits = theCropParameter.areaUnits();
00069   mUseCommonLand = theCropParameter.useCommonLand();
00070   mUseSpecificLand = theCropParameter.useSpecificLand();
00071   mRasterName = theCropParameter.rasterName();
00072   return *this;
00073 }

00171 bool LaCropParameter::fromXml(QString theXml)
00172 {
00173   //qDebug("Loading CropParameter from xml");
00174   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00175   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00176   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("cropParameter");
00177   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00178   {
00179     //TODO - just make this a warning
00180    //qDebug("top element could not be found!");
00181   }
00182   //qDebug("CropParameter::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00183   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00184   //qDebug("CropParameter::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00185   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00186   mDescription=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("description").text());
00187   mCropGuid=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("crop").text());
00188   mPercentTameCrop=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("percentTameCrop").text()).toFloat();
00189   mCropRotation=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("cropRotation").text()).toInt();
00190   mFallowRatio=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fallowRatio").text()).toFloat();
00191   mFallowValue=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fallowValue").text()).toInt();
00192 
00193   QString myAreaUnits = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text());
00194   if (myAreaUnits == "Dunum")
00195   {
00196     mAreaUnits=Dunum;
00197   }
00198   else if (myAreaUnits == "Hectare")
00199   {
00200     mAreaUnits=Hectare;
00201   }
00202   //mAreaUnits=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text()).toInt();
00203   mUseCommonLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("useCommonLand").text()).toInt();
00204   mUseSpecificLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("useSpecificLand").text()).toInt();
00205   mRasterName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("rasterName").text());
00206   return true;
00207 }
00208 
00209 QString LaCropParameter::toXml()
00210 {
00211   QString myString;
00212   QString myUnits = (mAreaUnits==0) ? "Dunum" : "Hectare";
00213   myString+=QString("<cropParameter guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00214   myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00215   myString+=QString("  <description>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "</description>\n");
00216   myString+=QString("  <crop>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mCropGuid) + "</crop>\n");
00217   myString+=QString("  <percentTameCrop>" + QString::number(mPercentTameCrop) + "</percentTameCrop>\n");
00218   myString+=QString("  <cropRotation>" + QString::number(mCropRotation) + "</cropRotation>\n");
00219   myString+=QString("  <fallowRatio>" + QString::number(mFallowRatio) + "</fallowRatio>\n");
00220   myString+=QString("  <fallowValue>" + QString::number(mFallowValue) + "</fallowValue>\n");
00221   myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>" + myUnits + "</areaUnits>\n");
00222   myString+=QString("  <useCommonLand>" + QString::number(mUseCommonLand) + "</useCommonLand>\n");
00223   myString+=QString("  <useSpecificLand>" + QString::number(mUseSpecificLand) + "</useSpecificLand>\n");
00224   myString+=QString("  <rasterName>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "</rasterName>\n");
00225   myString+=QString("</cropParameter>\n");
00226   return myString;
00227 }
00228 
00229 QString LaCropParameter::toText()
00230 {
00231   QString myString;
00232   myString+=QString("guid=>" + guid() + "\n");
00233   myString+=QString("name=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "\n");
00234   myString+=QString("description=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "\n");
00235   myString+=QString("crop=>" + mCropGuid + "\n");
00236   myString+=QString("percentTameCrop=>" + QString::number(mPercentTameCrop) + "\n");
00237   QString myCropRotation = (mCropRotation==0) ? "None" : "Used";
00238   myString+=QString("cropRotation=>" + myCropRotation + "\n");
00239   myString+=QString("fallowRatio=>" + QString::number(mFallowRatio) + "\n");
00240 
00241   QString myUnits = (mAreaUnits==0) ? "Dunum" : "Hectare";
00242   myString+=QString("fallowValue kg/" + myUnits + "=>" + QString::number(mFallowValue) + "\n");
00243   //myString+=QString("areaUnits=>" + QString::number(mAreaUnits) + "\n");
00244 
00245   QString myLandUsed = (mUseCommonLand==1) ? "Common" : "Specific";
00246   myString+=QString("Landused=>" + myLandUsed + "\n");
00247   //myString+=QString("useSpecificLand=>" + QString::number(mUseSpecificLand) + "\n");
00248   myString+=QString("rasterName=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "\n");
00249   return myString;
00250 }
00251 QString LaCropParameter::toHtml()
00252 {
00253   QString myString;
00254   QString myCropRotation = (mCropRotation==0) ? "None" : "Used";
00255   QString myUnits = (mAreaUnits==0) ? "Dunum" : "Hectare";
00256   QString myLandUsed = (mUseCommonLand==1) ? "Common" : "Specific";
00257   QString myRasterName = (mUseCommonLand==1) ? "LaCropCommonMask" : mRasterName;
00258 
00259   myString+="<h3 >Details for " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h3>";
00260   myString+="<table>";  //  myString+="<tr><td><b>GUID:</th><td>" + guid() + "</td></tr>";
00261   myString+="<tr><td><b>Description: </b></td><td>" + mDescription + "</td></tr>";
00262   myString+="<tr><td><b>Raster Mask: </b></td><td>" + mRasterName + "</td></tr>";
00263   myString+="<tr><td><b>Percent Tame Crop Diet: </b></td><td>" + QString::number(mPercentTameCrop) + "</td></tr>";
00264   myString+="<tr><td><b>cropRotation: </b></td><td>" + myCropRotation + "</td></tr>";
00265   myString+="<tr><td><b>fallowRatio: </b></th><td>" + QString::number(mFallowRatio) + "</td></tr>";
00266   myString+="<tr><td><b>Fallow Value kg/" + myUnits + ": </b></td><td>" + QString::number(mFallowValue) + "</td></tr>";
00267 
00268   myString+=("<tr><td><b>" + myLandUsed + " Land Raster: </b></td><td>" + myRasterName + "</td></tr>");
00269   myString+="</table>";
00270   return myString;
00271 }
